Verses: 2 naan Yoodhaavin Koththiraththil Oorudaiya Maganaana Ooriyin Kumaaran Pesaleyelaip Persolli Azhaiththu,
3 vinodhamaana Velaigalai Avan Yosiththuch Seygiradharkum, Ponnilum Velliyilum Vengalaththilum Velaiseygiradharkum,
4 raththinangalai Muththiraivettaaka Vettip Padhikkiradharkum, Maraththil Siththiravelaigalaich Seygiradharkum,
5 matrum Sagalavidha Velaigalaiyum Yoogiththuch Seygiradharkum Vendiya Gnaanamum Puththiyum Arivum Avanukku Undaaga, Avanai Dhevaaaviyinaal Nirappinen.

6 melum, Thaan Koththiraththilulla Akisaamaakin Kumaaranaagiya Agoliyaabaiyum Avanode Thunaiyaagak Koottinadhumandri, Gnaana Irudhayamulla Yaavarudaiya Irudhayaththilum Gnaanaththai Arulinen; Naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyitta Yaavaiyum Avargal Seyvaargal.
7 aasarippuk Koodaaraththaiyum Saatchip Pettiyaiyum Adhinmelulla Kirubaasanaththaiyum, Koodaaraththilulla Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum,
8 mejaiyaiyum Adhin Panimuttugalaiyum, Suththamaana Kuththuvilakkaiyum Adhin Sagala Karuvigalaiyum, Thoobabeedaththaiyum,
9 thaganabalibeedaththaiyum Adhin Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum, Thottiyaiyum Adhin Paadhaththaiyum,
10 aaraadhanai Vasthirangalaiyum, Aasaariya Oozhiyam Seyvadharkaana Aasaariyanaagiya Aaronin Parisuththa Vasthirangalaiyum, Avan Kumaararin Vasthirangalaiyum,
11 abishega Thailaththaiyum, Parisuththa Sthalaththukkuch Sugandhavarkkangalaagiya Thoobavarkkaththaiyum, Naan Unakkuk Kattalaiyittabadiye, Avargal Seyyavendum Endraar.

13 nee Isravel Puththirarai Nokki, Neengal En Oivunaatkalai Aasarikka Vendum; Ungalaip Parisuththappaduththugira Karththar Naan Enbadhai Neengal Ariyumbadi, Idhu Ungal Thalaimuraidhorum Enakkum Ungalukkum Adaiyaalamaayirukkum.

14 aagaiyaal, Oivunaalai Aasarippeerkalaaga; Adhu Ungalukkup Parisuththamaanadhu; Adhaip Parisuththak Kulaichchalaakkukiravan Kolaiyunnakkadavan; Adhile Velaiseygira Endha Aaththumaavum Than Janaththin Naduvil Iraadhabadikku Aruppundupovaan.
15 aarunaalum Velaiseyyalaam; Ezhaam Naalo Velai Ozhindhirukkum Oivunaal; Adhu Karththarukkup Parisuththamaanadhu; Oivunaalil Velaiseygiravan Evanum Kolaiseyyappadavendum.
16 aagaiyaal, Isravel Puththirar Thangal Thalaimuraidhorum Oivunaalai Niththiya Udanbadikkaiyaaga Aasarikkumbadi, Adhaik Kaikkollakkadavargal.
17 adhu Endraikkum Enakkum Isravel Puththirarukkum Adaiyaalamaayirukkum; Aarunaalaikkulle Karththar Vaanaththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Undaakki, Ezhaam Naalile Oindhirundhu Pooriththaar Endraar.
18 seenaaimalaiyil Avar Moseyode Pesi Mudindhapin, Dhevanudaiya Viralinaal Ezhudhappatta Karpalagaigalaagiya Saatchiyin Irandu Palagaigalai Avanidaththil Koduththaar.
